fontFamilies.name: Old Style
fontFamilies.fontFamily: 'Iowan Old Style', 'Palatino Linotype', 'URW Palladio L', P052, serif

fontFamilies.name: Humanist
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Seravek, 'Gill Sans Nova', Ubuntu, Calibri, 'DejaVu Sans', source-sans-pro, sans-serif

fontFamilies.name: Geometric Humanist
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Avenir, Montserrat, Corbel, 'URW Gothic', source-sans-pro, sans-serif

fontFamilies.name: Neo-Grotesque
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Inter, Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Arial Nova', 'Nimbus Sans', Arial, sans-serif

fontFamilies.name: Monospace Code
fontFamilies.fontFamily: ui-monospace, 'Cascadia Code', 'Source Code Pro', Menlo, Consolas, 'DejaVu Sans Mono', monospace

fontFamilies.name: Industrial
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Bahnschrift, 'DIN Alternate', 'Franklin Gothic Medium', 'Nimbus Sans Narrow', sans-serif-condensed, sans-serif

fontFamilies.name: Rounded Sans
fontFamilies.fontFamily: ui-rounded, 'Hiragino Maru Gothic ProN', Quicksand, Comfortaa, Manjari, 'Arial Rounded MT', 'Arial Rounded MT Bold', Calibri, source-sans-pro, sans-serif

fontFamilies.name: Slab Serif
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Rockwell, 'Rockwell Nova', 'Roboto Slab', 'DejaVu Serif', 'Sitka Small', serif

fontFamilies.name: Antique
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Superclarendon, 'Bookman Old Style', 'URW Bookman', 'URW Bookman L', 'Georgia Pro', Georgia, serif

fontFamilies.name: Didone
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Didot, 'Bodoni MT', 'Noto Serif Display', 'URW Palladio L', P052, Sylfaen, serif

fontFamilies.name: Handwritten
fontFamilies.fontFamily: 'Segoe Print', 'Bradley Hand', Chilanka, TSCu_Comic, casual, cursive
